name: Symphony Teleca Corporation
tag_list: software-development, saas, enterprise-mobility, cloud-solutions, mobile-app, mobile-devices
overview:
Symphony Teleca Corporation is the world’s first services organization dedicated to help clients rapidly develop, deploy and manage software and software-enabled products aimed at solving challenges arising from the massive global convergence of software, cloud and mobility.

It was formed on February 9, 2012 through the merger between Symphony Services Corporation and Teleca AB. The combined company has 6,100 employees worldwide with 35 global offices including 12 delivery centers throughout China, India, Japan, the US, Europe and South America.

Symphony Teleca remains its headquarters in Palo Alto, California.
